Test Name: SPSD/PERM Antibody Panel, CSF (Anti-GAD65, Anti-Amphiphysin, Anti-Glycine Receptor)
Purpose: To detect CSF antibodies associated with Stiff-Person Spectrum Disorders and Progressive Encephalomyelitis with Rigidity and Myoclonus for accurate diagnosis and patient management.
Container: Sterile screw-cap CSF collection tube obtained during lumbar puncture
Equipment: ELISA microplate reader, automated immunoassay analyzers, centrifuge, calibrated pipettes
